        Returns the result of a division of teh first value divided by the second value.
        Parameters:
        value1 - the dividend
        value2 - the divisor, or that value that value1 is divided by
        scale - the number of decimal places allowable in the result
        Returns:
        a double that results from the division of value1 by value2
